item.title: Salah left out by Liverpool for Inter Milan game
item.description: Mohamed Salah has been left out of the squad for Liverpool's Champions League match at Inter Milan.

item.title: Salah left out by Liverpool for Inter Milan game
item.description: Mohamed Salah has been left out of the squad for Liverpool's Champions League match at Inter Milan.

item.title: Rapper Ghetts admits death by dangerous driving
item.description: The musician killed Yubin Tamang, 20, in Ilford, north-east London, in a hit-and-run collision.

item.title: Leonardo DiCaprio's One Battle After Another leads Golden Globe nominations
item.description: Hamnet and Sinners are also recognised, with Timothee Chalamet and Cynthia Erivo up for acting prizes.

item.title: Paramount launches rival bid for Warner Bros Discovery
item.description: Paramount says its proposal is a "superior alternative" for shareholders than the rival offer from Netflix.
